abilities.name: Flammability
about: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to fire damage and gives damage hit more chance to ignite

abilities.name: Firestorm
about: Rains numerous fiery bolts in an area

abilities.name: Fire Bombs
about: Spawns multiple Fire Bombs around the arena that explode after a delay
Visible only after killing Herald of Thunder

abilities.name: Conductivity
about: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to lightning damage and gives damage hit more chance to shock

abilities.name: Shock Nova
about: Deals lightning damage in an area around the encounter, conjuring an initial ring followed by a larger circular area.

abilities.name: Lightning Bolt
about: Fires few Lightning Bolts at you

abilities.name: Lightning Bombs
about: Spawns multiple Bombs around the arena that explode after a delay
Visible only after killing Herald of Ashes
